name: Arcana Overwhelming
desc: Gain AP Ability Power equal to 50.0% of Magic Resist. Gain 100 Magic Resist.

name: Attack Expert
desc: This champion gains 55% more Attack Damage from all sources.

name: Avalanche of Armor
desc: Gain AD Attack Damage equal to 30.0% of Armor. Gain 99 AR Armor.

name: Avarice Incarnate
desc: Gain 5 gold. Gain 15% Damage Amp and 1.0% more per 2 gold you have (up to 40%).

name: Berserker Rage
desc: Gain 25 Ability Power & 25% Attack Damage. Triple it when below 85% Health.

name: Brutal Claws
desc: This champion gains 40% Critical Strike chance and Critical Strikes bleed for 40% of their damage (as the same damage type) over 3 seconds.

name: Bully
desc: Gain 11.0% Damage Amp, increased to 33% against units with a lower star level.

name: Bulwark
desc: Gain 40 Armor & 40 Magic Resist. Triple it when above 50% health.

name: Calling Card
desc: Gain an emblem that matches a non-unique trait from this champion.

name: Center of the Universe
desc: Gain 6 stars that orbit this champion. Each star deals 80 magic damage and the orbit expands to hit the champion\'s current target.

name: Comeback Story
desc: Gain 5.0% Damage Amp for every 10 player health you have lost this game.

name: Cull The Weak
desc: Gain up to 100.0% Critical Strike Chance based on target\'s missing Health. Every 3 seconds, target the lowest percent Health enemy in range.

name: Cultivating Magic
desc: Gain 30 Ability Power. Gain 5 Ability Power permanently for every 10000 damage they deal.

name: Cybernetic Speed
desc: Gain 8.0% Attack Speed and at combat start, an additional 2.0% Attack Speed for each component held by your team.

name: Deep Roots
desc: Gain 700 Health, 25 Armor, and 25 Magic Resist. They cannot move or be stunned, and pull their target into melee range.

name: Defense Expert
desc: This champion gains 110% more Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

name: Diving In
desc: On first cast, leap to enemies and stun in a 2-hex radius for 1.5 seconds and gain 25.0% Attack Speed and 15.0% Omnivamp.

name: Dragonsoul
desc: This champion\'s first attack against a new target fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 20.0% max Health true damage.

name: Dramatic Entrance
desc: Combat start: Leap off the battlefield. After 6 seconds, arrive with 55.00000000000001% increased max Health and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> all enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Dual Wielding
desc: Gain 2 completed items that fit this champion\'s role.

name: Eagle Eye
desc: Gain +1 Range. Every 2 seconds this champion doesn\'t move, gain 9.0% Attack Damage.

name: Energy Absorption
desc: Gain 30 Ability Power. Each time an ally dies, gain 8.0% of their Ability Power.

name: Fireball
desc: For every 70 Mana spent, throw a 2-hex fireball that deals 6.0% max Health true damage and <TFTKeyword>Burns</TFTKeyword> for 5 seconds.

name: Force of Friendship
desc: Gain 1.0% Damage Amp for each star level on your board. Three-star champions grant 8% Damage Amp instead.

name: Fortified
desc: Gain 12.0% max Health. Every 4 seconds, gain another 12.0% (up to 5 times).

name: Freestyling
desc: Gain 5.0% Damage Amp for each activated non-unique trait you have.

name: Giant-Sized
desc: Gain 1000 Health and grow greatly in size.

name: Headhunter
desc: This champion gains 15% Attack Speed. Every 1 kills, they permanently gain 1% more (doubled in Hyper Roll).

name: Heavy Hitter
desc: Attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 30.0% of this champion\'s max Health. (Cooldown: 1.5 seconds)

name: Hivemind
desc: Gain a copy of the first champion this champion scores a takedown on each player combat. Gain 25% Damage Amp.

name: Hunger For Power
desc: Combat start: Consume an adjacent ally Champion and gain 75% of their Health and Attack Damage.

name: Hypervelocity
desc: Gain 20.0% Attack Speed. On cast, gain 15.0% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Into the Unknown
desc: This champion disappears for 3 rounds. When they return, they gain 60 Ability Power and 60.0% Attack Damage.

name: Invisibility
desc: Every 6 seconds, turn invisible for 1 second. The next attack has 100.0% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Kill Streak
desc: Gain 20 Mana each kill.

name: Knockout
desc: Gain 15.0% Attack Damage. The next attack after casting gains 35.0% Critical Strike Chance and deals 90.0% true damage.

name: Laser Eyes
desc: Constantly deal 175.0% Ability Power magic damage per second in a 3-hex line and <TFTKeyword>Burn</TFTKeyword> enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Last Chance
desc: On first death, revive to full Health, gain 33.0% Attack Speed and 20.0% Omnivamp but lose 12.5% Health each second.

name: Legacy Of Shurima
desc: After 10 seconds of combat, ascend, gaining 50.0% max Health and 60.0% Attack Speed

name: Mage Armor
desc: Gain Armor and Magic Resist equal to 50.0% of Ability Power.

name: Magic Expert
desc: This champion gains 40% more Ability Power from all sources.

name: Magic Training
desc: Gain 15 Ability Power. On cast, your team gains 2 Ability Power for every 20 Mana spent.

name: Mini Mees
desc: Gain 3 minis that deal 30.0% (AD) Attack Damage every 2 attacks. Their attacks reduce Armor by 5.

name: Nothing Wasted
desc: When an ally dies, gain 50.0% of their current Mana.

name: One Thousand Cuts
desc: Attacks deal 30 bonus true damage, plus 12 true damage for each time the target was damaged by this effect.

name: Power Absorption
desc: Gain 30.0% Attack Damage. Each time an ally dies, gain 9.0% of their Attack Damage.

name: Power Up
desc: Gain 20.0% Attack Damage. Gain 5.0% Attack Damage permanently for every 10000 damage they deal.

name: Protective Shielding
desc: Combat Start and every 8 seconds: Grant 12.0% max Health Shield to self and 2 lowest health allies for 4 seconds.

name: Repulsor
desc: Gain 50.0% Attack Speed. On cast, knock back their target if within 3 hexes of them.

name: Scuttle Familiar
desc: On death, summon a crab with 100% of their maximum Health, Armor, and Magic Resist.

name: Share Your Energy
desc: Combat start: grant 12.0% of their Attack Damage, Ability Power, Health, Armor, and Magic Resist to adjacent allies.

name: Slime Time
desc: Every 2 seconds, deal 200.0% (AP) magic damage in a 1-hex radius and heal this champion for 100.0% of damage dealt.

name: Slow Cooker
desc: Every second, deal magic damage in a 1-hex radius equal to 3.0% of their max Health. Radius increases every 6 seconds.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Combat start: Gain 225 Armor and Magic Resist. Every second, reduce this bonus by 10.

name: Strength Training
desc: Gain 20% Attack Damage. Every 3 times they attack, your team gains 4% Attack Damage.

name: The Finisher
desc: This champion\'s attacks and Ability executes enemy champions at 15.0% health or lower.

name: Thornskin
desc: Gain 60 Armor and 60 Magic Resist. When damaged, deal 20.0% of the damage blocked to adjacent enemies as magic damage.

name: Titan of Teamwork
desc: Gain 1.0% Durability for each star level on your board. Three-star champions grant 6% Durability instead.

name: Titanic Strikes
desc: Attacks deal an additional 50.0% Attack Damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

name: Touch of Frost
desc: Ability casts 20% <TFTKeyword>Chill</TFTKeyword> (reduce Attack Speed) enemies for 8 seconds. When <TFTKeyword>Chilled</TFTKeyword> enemies die, they stun the nearest enemy for 2.5 second.

name: Ultimate Hero
desc: After 4 rounds, star up a 3-star 1-cost champion to 4 stars!

name: Unstoppable Force
desc: On takedown, charge the next target and Stun them for 1.5 seconds, then heal 10% max Health.

name: Vampiric Affinity
desc: Gain 20.0% Omnivamp. Increase this to 50.0% Omnivamp while below 75.0% health.

name: Voracious Appetite
desc: This champion gains 300 Health and 15.0% Damage Amp. Each round gain a consumable that grants 100 HP and 2.0% DA in exchange for 3 player health.

name: Wolf Familiars
desc: Summon 2 untargetable wolves with 75.0% of this champion\'s Attack Damage and 0.9 Attack Speed.
